trans-unit.source: Provides a reply that is correlated to an incoming request.
You get a request context from an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel> 取得要求內容。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext> encapsulates the information required to reply to the request, so that you do not have to block on the channel when waiting for each request message to receive a reply.
trans-unit.target: 每個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext> 會封裝回覆要求所需的資訊，因此當等候每個要求訊息接收回覆時就不需要封鎖通道。

trans-unit.source: In the request/reply model, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext> object is the link between the request that comes in and the reply that goes out. When the server receives a request, it provides a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext> instance that represents the request to the channel.
trans-unit.target: 在要求/回覆模型中，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext> 物件是傳入要求與傳出回覆之間的連結。當伺服器接收要求時，會提供代表通道要求的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The request context contains the original request message among other useful properties.
trans-unit.target: 除了其他有用的屬性以外，要求內容也會包含原始要求訊息。

trans-unit.source: This request context is then stashed inside the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext> for retrieval by your service.
trans-unit.target: 然後這個要求內容就會隱藏在 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext> 中以便讓服務擷取。

trans-unit.source: You typically use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.Current%2A> property to access the request of the current operation.
trans-unit.target: 您通常會使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationContext.Current%2A> 屬性存取目前作業的要求。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext> can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext> 的值可以是 `null`。

trans-unit.source: Because the role of the request context is to link requests to replies, it does not make sense to have a request context when you do not have a reply, and so in this case the context is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 因為要求內容的角色是將要求連結至回覆，所以當沒有回覆時就不需要要求內容，因此在此例中內容會設定為 `null`。

trans-unit.source: For a one-way operation on top of the request/reply model, the server receives requests but does not send back a response to the client.
trans-unit.target: 針對要求/回覆模型上方的單向作業，伺服器會接收要求但是不會將回應傳回至用戶端。

trans-unit.source: So if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext> is `null` unexpectedly, check first whether the operation contract is IsOneWay.
trans-unit.target: 所以如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext> 意外成為 `null`，請先檢查作業合約是否為 IsOneWay。

trans-unit.source: Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class:
trans-unit.target: 給衍生自此類別之 Managed C++ 使用者的特別說明：

trans-unit.source: Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor.
trans-unit.target: 請將您的清除程式碼置於 (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort)，而不是解構函式。

trans-unit.source: Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto-generate <xref:System.IDisposable>.
trans-unit.target: 避免使用解構函式，因為它們會導致編譯器自動產生 <xref:System.IDisposable>。

trans-unit.source: Avoid non-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto-generate <xref:System.IDisposable>.
trans-unit.target: 避免使用非參考成員，因為它們會導致編譯器自動產生 <xref:System.IDisposable>。

trans-unit.source: Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%28System.Object%29> and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) to emulate what would have been the auto-generated <xref:System.IDisposable> behavior.
trans-unit.target: 避免使用完成項，但如果您要加入完成項，則應隱藏建置警告並從 (On)(Begin)Close (和/或 OnAbort) 呼叫 <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%28System.Object%29><xref:System.IDisposable>和完成項本身，以模擬原本可能自動產生的 行為。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext" /> class.
When overridden in a derived class, aborts processing the request associated with the context.
Begins an asynchronous operation to reply to the request associated with the current context.
The asynchronous operation is available with or without an explicit time-out.
trans-unit.target: 不管有沒有明確的逾時，都可以使用非同步的作業。

trans-unit.source: The incoming <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> that contains the request.
The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous reply operation completion.
An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous reply operation.
When overridden in a derived class, begins an asynchronous operation to reply to the request associated with the current context.
The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous reply operation.
Use the asynchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.BeginReply%2A> method when the application processing must continue without waiting.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式必須繼續處理而不能等候時，請使用非同步的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.BeginReply%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.Reply%2A> methods when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it replies to the request message or until the time-out interval is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 當目前的執行緒可接受進行封鎖並同時回覆要求訊息，或是直到已超過逾時間隔時，請使用其中一種同步的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.Reply%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會透過回呼 (Callback)，接收有關作業之事件處理常式身分識別的通知。

trans-unit.source: The operation is not complete until either the reply is sent or the time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在傳送回覆或發生逾時之後，作業才會完成。

trans-unit.source: The operation throws a <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> if the specified <paramref name="timeout" /> is exceeded before it completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果在作業完成之前超出了指定的 <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" />，作業會擲回 <paramref name="timeout" />。

trans-unit.source: The incoming <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> that contains the request.
The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies the interval of time to wait for the reply to an available request.
The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous reply operation completion.
An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous reply operation.
When overridden in a derived class, begins an asynchronous operation to reply to the request associated with the current context within a specified interval of time.
The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous reply operation.
Use the asynchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.BeginReply%2A> method to allow the application processing to continue without waiting for the request to complete.
trans-unit.target: 使用非同步 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.BeginReply%2A> 方法以便讓應用程式繼續處理，而不用等候要求完成。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.Reply%2A> methods when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it replies to the request message or until the time-out interval is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 當目前的執行緒可接受進行封鎖並同時回覆要求訊息，或是直到已超過逾時間隔時，請使用其中一種同步的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.Reply%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會透過回呼 (Callback)，接收有關作業之事件處理常式身分識別的通知。

trans-unit.source: The operation is not complete until either the reply is sent or the time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在傳送回覆或發生逾時之後，作業才會完成。

trans-unit.source: The operation throws a <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> if the specified <paramref name="timeout" /> is exceeded before it completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果在作業完成之前超出了指定的 <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" />，作業會擲回 <paramref name="timeout" />。

trans-unit.source: Closes the operation that is replying to the request context associated with the current context.
When overridden in a derived class, closes the operation that is replying to the request context associated with the current context.
The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies the interval of time within which the reply operation associated with the current context must close.
When overridden in a derived class, closes the operation that is replying to the request context associated with the current context within a specified interval of time.
The operation should throw a <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" /> if the specified <paramref name="timeout" /> is exceeded before it completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果在作業完成之前超出了指定的 <see cref="T:System.TimeoutException" />，作業會擲回 <paramref name="timeout" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
Releases resources associated with the context.
The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> returned by a call to one of the <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.BeginReply" /> methods.
When overridden in a derived class, completes an asynchronous operation to reply to a request message.
Replies to a request message.
The incoming <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> that contains the request.
When overridden in a derived class, replies to a request message.
Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.Reply%2A> when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it replies to the request message.
trans-unit.target: 當目前的執行緒可接受進行封鎖並同時回覆要求訊息時，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.Reply%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The thread is blocked up to the specified `timeout`.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒會持續封鎖，直到指定的 `timeout` 為止。

trans-unit.source: If the application processing must continue without waiting for the reply to complete, use the asynchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.BeginReply%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式必須繼續處理而不要等候回覆完成，請使用非同步 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.BeginReply%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會透過回呼 (Callback)，接收有關作業之事件處理常式身分識別的通知。

trans-unit.source: The operation is not complete until either a message becomes available in the channel or the time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在訊息可以於通道中使用或發生逾時之後，作業才會完成。

trans-unit.source: The incoming <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> that contains the request.
The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies the interval of time to wait for the reply to a request.
When overridden in a derived class, replies to a request message within a specified interval of time.
Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.Reply%2A> when it is acceptable for the current thread to be blocked while it replies to the request message.
trans-unit.target: 當目前的執行緒可接受進行封鎖並同時回覆要求訊息時，請使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.Reply%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The thread is blocked up to the specified `timeout`.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒會持續封鎖，直到指定的 `timeout` 為止。

trans-unit.source: If the application processing must continue without waiting for the reply to complete, use the asynchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.BeginReply%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式必須繼續處理而不要等候回覆完成，請使用非同步 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.RequestContext.BeginReply%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method receives notification, through a callback, of the identity of the event handler for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會透過回呼 (Callback)，接收有關作業之事件處理常式身分識別的通知。

trans-unit.source: The operation is not complete until either a message becomes available in the channel or the time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在訊息可以於通道中使用或發生逾時之後，作業才會完成。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the message that contains the request.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" /> that contains the request.
trans-unit.target: 包含要求的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases both managed and unmanaged resources associated with the context.
